result.name: 2020-high-frequency-magnetic-field-induction-coil-data-from-eskdalemuir-observatory-uk
result.notes: 2020 data consists of high frequency (100 Hz) data from two horizontal induction coils measuring the Earth's magnetic field at the Eskdalemuir Observatory in the United Kingdom (Location in Geographic Coordinates: 55.314° N 356.794° E and Elevation: 245m above mean sea level).
